verbose_text: Moreover, it is also reported that MZR inhibits the action of alpha3beta1 integrin by reacting with HSP60, mentioned above, and then decreases the motion capability of fibroblast specific protein (FSP)-1-positive fibroblasts which are involved in development of interstitial fibrous change in IgA nephropathy [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: MZR inhibits the action of alpha3beta1 integrin
